subSections.title: Glyph origin
Pronunciation 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=chā,chà
|m_note=chā - literary (“to differ; mistake; (''maths'') difference; barely”); chà - colloquial (“to differ; wrong; inferior; to be short of; to owe”)
|c=caa1
|h=pfs=chhâ
|md=chă
|mn=chha
|w=1tsho
|mc=1+2+3
|oc=1,2+3+4
|cat=v,n,a,adv
}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[differ]] from; to be [[different]]; [[dissimilar]]; [[incongruous]]
# [[wrong]]; [[incorrect]]; [[erroneous]]
# [[inferior]]; [[poor]]; [[substandard]]
# [[difference]]; [[discrepancy]]
# [[mistake]]; [[wrongdoing]]
# {{lb|zh|mathematics}} [[difference]]
# to be [[short]] of; to [[fall short]] of
# to [[owe]]
# [[rather]]; [[barely]]; [[nearly]]; [[almost]]
# 11th [[tetragram]] of the [[Taixuanjing]]; "[[divergence]]" ([[𝌐]])
